column1: Other
column2: MsBellaMorte, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: DO NOT TAKE THIS DRUG!I was prescribed this medication for neck/back/and shoulder pain after a car accident. My muscles are constantly tight, inflamed, and aching. This gave me no relief whatsoever, and caused me great discomfort. The nausea and stomach pain was almost unbearable. Headache, irritability, and insomnia was debilitating. The worst part of it was at night when I would try lay down to sleep, I felt as though I was going through opiate withdrawals. Severe pain and aching in all my muscles, especially my legs and back, causing me to be restless to the point of having anxiety attacks. There is no relief for withdrawal symptoms - only waiting until the toxin is out of your body. I asked NOT to be given opiates for this reason, but now I wish I had, because at least opiate pain killers relieve the pain before putting you through so much misery. I also read from these reviews people with CHF, high blood pressure, and asthma should not be on this medication. My doctor should have known better than to prescribe me this evil drug. I will never take this medicine again.
